featured.text: The appropriate tools are only available in some countries.
Which of the following is the most appropriate interpretation of “ ” in the last paragraph? (A)
What’s a Friend for (B) Seashells and Mollusks (C) Appropriate Topics for Writing (D) Writing for Different Purposes 42.

definition.en_def: suitable or proper in the circumstances
definition.example: It is important to wear appropriate clothing for the weather.
